article_title: Is Montana a ‘red’ or ‘blue’ state? Lots of both, actually – and very much divided
article_text:

article_metadata.author: Kristi Angel

og.description: Editor’s note: This is the first installment of a two-day series on the divided political landscape in Montana, which is neither “red” nor “blue,” but somewhere in between.
og.title: Is Montana a ‘red’ or ‘blue’ state? Lots of both, actually – and very much divided
